document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Manthar Villa on Delzorin Street.
document_data.name: Manthar Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Manthar Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Manthar]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the eastern section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the northwest corner of the intersection of [[Shield Street]] and [[Delzorin Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained a large central building and several smaller surrounding structures. Each building stood between one and three stories tall.
